Title: Head Butt
CardEffect: When successfully played, discard 1 card of your choice from your hand.

Title: Haymaker
CardEffect: When successfully played, all Strike maneuvers are +1D for the rest of this turn.

Title: Back Body Drop
CardEffect: The card titled Irish Whip must be played before playing this card. When successfully played, you may either draw 2 cards, or force opponent to discard 2 cards.

Title: Kick
CardEffect: When successfully played, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile.

Title: Running Elbow Smash
CardEffect: When successfully played, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile.

Title: Discus Punch
CardEffect: Reversals to this maneuver are +2D.

Title: Superkick
CardEffect: When successfully played, +5D if played after a 5D or greater maneuver.

Title: Spinning Heel Kick
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

Title: Clothesline
CardEffect: When successfully played, if your next card played this turn is a maneuver it is +2D.

Title: Arm Drag
CardEffect: When successfully played, discard 1 card of your choice from your hand.

Title: Snap Mare
CardEffect: When successfully played, if your next card played this turn is a Strike maneuver it is +2D.

Title: Double Leg Takedown
CardEffect: When successfully played, you may draw 1 card.

Title: Fireman's Carry
CardEffect: When successfully played, you may look at your opponent's hand.

Title: Headlock Takedown
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must draw 1 card.

Title: Atomic Drop
CardEffect: When successfully played, if your next card played this turn is a maneuver it is +2D.

Title: Pump Handle Slam
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 2 cards.

Title: Reverse DDT
CardEffect: When successfully played, you may draw 1 card.

Title: Samoan Drop
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

Title: Bulldog
CardEffect: When successfully played, discard 1 card of your choice from your hand. Look at opponent's hand, then choose and discard 1 card from his hand.

Title: Fisherman's Suplex
CardEffect: When successfully played, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile. You may draw 1 card.

Title: DDT
CardEffect: When successfully played, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile. Opponent must discard 2 cards.

Title: Power Slam
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

Title: Powerbomb
CardEffect: When successfully played, you may draw 1 card. Add +1D for every maneuver with the word "slam" in its title in your Ring area.

EffectAsManeuver.SpecialCondition: # for each slam word in your ring area

Title: Press Slam
CardEffect: When successfully played, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile. Opponent must discard 2 cards.

Title: Arm Bar
CardEffect: When successfully played, discard 1 card of your choice from your hand.

Title: Bear Hug
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

Title: Full Nelson
CardEffect: When successfully played, look through your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold and place that card in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.

Title: Choke Hold
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

Title: Ankle Lock
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

Title: Standing Side Headlock
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must draw 1 card.

Title: Cobra Clutch
CardEffect: When successfully played, look through your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold and place that card in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.

Title: Chicken Wing
CardEffect: When successfully played, shuffle 2 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

Title: Sleeper
CardEffect: When successfully played, look through your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold and place that card in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.

Title: Camel Clutch
CardEffect: When successfully played, look through your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold and place that card in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.

Title: Boston Crab
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

Title: Guillotine Stretch
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card and you may draw 1 card.

Title: Abdominal Stretch
CardEffect: When successfully played, you may discard 3 cards, search through your Arsenal and put 1 card into your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.

Title: Torture Rack
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

Title: Figure Four Leg Lock
CardEffect: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

Title: Austin Elbow Smash
CardEffect: May not be reversed. Can only be played after a maneuver that does 5D or greater.

Title: Stone Cold Stunner
CardEffect: -6F on this card if played after the maneuver titled Kick.

Title: Undertaker's Flying Clothesline
CardEffect: Can only be played after a 5D or greater maneuver. Reversals to this maneuver are +6D.

Title: Tree of Woe
CardEffect: May not be reversed. When successfully played, opponent must discard 2 cards.

Title: Mandible Claw
CardEffect: -6F on this card if Mr. Socko card is in your Ring area. You may play the card titled Maintain Hold after this card as if it were a Submission maneuver.

Title: Leaping Knee to the Face
CardEffect: May not be reversed. You must play the card titled Irish Whip before playing this card. When successfully played, opponent discards 1 card.

Title: Kane's Flying Clothesline
CardEffect: Can only be played after a 4D or greater maneuver. Reversals to this maneuver are +6D.

Title: Kane's Tombstone Piledriver
CardEffect: -6F on this card if played after the card titled Kane's Choke Slam.

Title: Lionsault
CardEffect: Can only be played after a 4D or greater maneuver. When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

Title: Walls of Jericho
CardEffect: You may play the card titled Maintain Hold after this card as if it were a Submission maneuver.

Title: Shoulder Block
CardEffect: May only reverse a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip.

Title: Ensugiri
CardEffect: May only reverse the maneuver titled Kick.

Title: Drop Kick
CardEffect: May only reverse the maneuver titled Drop Kick.

Title: Spear
CardEffect: May only reverse a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip.

Title: Belly to Belly Suplex
CardEffect: May only reverse the maneuver titled Belly to Belly Suplex.

Title: Vertical Suplex
CardEffect: May only reverse the maneuver titled Vertical Suplex.

Title: Belly to Back Suplex
CardEffect: May only reverse the maneuver titled Belly to Back Suplex.

Title: Step Aside
CardEffect: Reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

Title: Escape Move
CardEffect: Reverse any Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

Title: Break the Hold
CardEffect: Reverse any Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

Title: Rolling Takedown
CardEffect: Can only reverse a Grapple that does 7D or less. End your opponent's turn. # = D of maneuver card being reversed. Read as 0 when in your Ring area.

Title: Knee to the Gut
CardEffect: Can only reverse a Strike that does 7D or less. End your opponent's turn. # = D of maneuver card being reversed. Read as 0 when in your Ring area.

Title: Elbow to the Face
CardEffect: May reverse any maneuver that does 7D or less. End your opponent's turn.

Title: Clean Break
CardEffect: If played from your hand, may reverse the card titled Jockeying for Position. Opponent must discard 4 cards. End your opponent's turn. Draw 1 card.

Title: Manager Interferes
CardEffect: Reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. If played from your hand draw 1 card.

Title: Disqualification!
CardEffect: Reverse any HEEL maneuver or reversal card if that opponent has 5 or more HEEL cards in his Ring area. Opponent is Disqualified and you win the game. This effect happens even if the card titled Disqualification is placed into your Ringside pile while applying damage from a HEEL maneuver or reversal card.

Title: No Chance in Hell
CardEffect: Reverse any ACTION card being played by your opponent from his hand. It is unsuccessful, goes to his Ringside pile, has no effect and ends his turn.

Title: Jockeying for Position
CardEffect: As an action, if your next card played is a Grapple maneuver, declare whether it will be +4D or your opponent's reversal to it will be +8F. As a reversal, may only reverse the card titled Jockeying for Position. If so, you end opponent's turn; and if your next card played on your turn is a Grapple maneuver, declare whether it will be +4D or your opponent's reversal to it will be +8F.

Title: Irish Whip
CardEffect: As an action, if your next card played is a Strike maneuver it is +5D. As a reversal, may only reverse the card titled Irish Whip. If so, you end opponent's turn; and if your next card played on your turn is a Strike maneuver it is +5D.

Title: Lou Thesz Press
CardEffect: If played from your hand, may reverse a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip. End your opponent's turn. You may draw 1 card.

Title: Double Digits
CardEffect: Reverse any Strike, Grapple or Submission maneuver. End your opponent's turn. If played from your hand, opponent must discard 2 cards, then take the top 2 cards from his Arsenal and put them into his Ringside pile.

Title: Undertaker Sits Up!
CardEffect: Reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. If played from your hand, take the top 4 cards from your Arsenal and put them in your Ringside pile. Opponent must discard 1 card; next turn, all your maneuvers are +2D, and all opponent's reversals are +25F.

Title: Have a Nice Day!
CardEffect: Reverse any Strike, Grapple or Submission maneuver. End your opponent's turn. If played from your hand, opponent discards all cards in his hand.

Title: Double Arm DDT
CardEffect: May only reverse the maneuver titled Back Body Drop.

Title: Facebuster
CardEffect: If played from your hand, may reverse a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip. End your opponent's turn. You may draw 2 cards.

Title: Pedigree
CardEffect: When successfully played, +2D if played after a Strike maneuver. May only reverse the maneuver titled Back Body Drop.

Title: Chyna Interferes
CardEffect: Reverses any maneuver and ends your opponent's turn. If played from your hand, draw 2 cards.

Title: Take That Move, Shine It Up Real Nice, Turn That Sumb*tch Sideways, and Stick It Straight Up Your Roody Poo Candy A%$!
CardEffect: Reverse any Strike, Grapple or Submission maneuver. End your opponent's turn. If played from your hand, shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

Title: Rock Bottom
CardEffect: When successfully played, look through your Ringside pile and Arsenal for the card titled The People's Elbow and place that card in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal. May only reverse a Grapple maneuver, but you must first discard 1 card.

Title: Kane's Return!
CardEffect: Reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. If played from your hand, take the top 4 cards from your Arsenal and put them in your Ringside pile; next turn, all your maneuvers are +2D, and all opponents reversals are +15F.

Title: Don't You Never... EVER!
CardEffect: Reverse any Strike, Grapple or Submission maneuver. End your opponent's turn. If played from your hand, opponent must discard 2 cards and all your maneuvers next turn are +2D.

Title: Cross Body Block
CardEffect: The card titled Irish Whip must be played before playing this card. May only reverse a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip.

Title: Chop
CardEffect: As an action, you may discard this card to draw 1 card. Doing this will not cause any damage to opponent.

Title: Arm Bar Takedown
CardEffect: As an action, you may discard this card to draw 1 card. Doing this will not cause any damage to opponent.

Title: Collar & Elbow Lockup
CardEffect: As an action, you may discard this card to draw 1 card. Doing this will not cause any damage to opponent.

Title: Hmmm
CardEffect: Look at the top 5 cards of your Arsenal. You may either arrange them in any order or shuffle your Arsenal.

Title: Don't Think Too Hard
CardEffect: Look at the top 5 cards of an opponent's Arsenal. You may either arrange them in any order or make him shuffle his Arsenal.

Title: Whaddya Got?
CardEffect: Look at opponent's hand.

Title: Not Yet
CardEffect: Take a card in your hand, shuffle it into your Arsenal, then draw 2 cards.

Title: Flash in the Pan
CardEffect: Draw 1 card. Look at opponent's hand, and then make him discard all HEEL cards.

Title: View of Villainy
CardEffect: Draw 1 card. Look at opponent's hand, and then make him discard all FACE cards.

Title: Shake It Off
CardEffect: Playable only if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Remove any 1 card in opponent's Ring area with a D value less than or equal to your total Fortitude Rating and place it into his Ringside pile.

Title: Offer Handshake
CardEffect: Draw up to 3 cards, then discard 1 card.

Title: Roll Out of the Ring
CardEffect: Discard up to 2 cards from your hand to your Ringside pile. Return an equal number of cards of your choice to your hand from your Ringside pile.

Title: Distract the Ref
CardEffect: Draw 1 card. Look at opponent's hand. If he has any cards titled Disqualification! he must discard them.

Title: Recovery
CardEffect: Shuffle any 2 cards from your Ringside pile back into your Arsenal. Then draw 1 card.

Title: Spit At Opponent
CardEffect: You discard 1 card. Your opponent discards 4 cards.

Title: Get Crowd Support
CardEffect: Draw 1 card. Your next maneuver this turn is +4D and opponent's reversals are +12F.

Title: Comeback!
CardEffect: Discard 3 cards of your choice from your hand. All players compare their current Fortitude Rating. The player(s) with a higher Fortitude Rating must remove maneuver and/or reversal cards from their Ring area, putting them into his Ringside pile, until that player's Fortitude Rating is less than or equal to the others.

Title: Ego Boost
CardEffect: Your next card played is -5F. If opponent forces you to discard a card from your hand, you may choose to discard this card from your hand and then draw up to 2 cards.

Title: Deluding Yourself
CardEffect: Draw 4 cards. At end of turn, discard your hand.

Title: Stagger
CardEffect: Play after a successfully played maneuver. If your next card played this turn is a maneuver of 7D or less your opponent can not reverse it.

Title: Diversion
CardEffect: Your next maneuver may not be reversed.

Title: Marking Out
CardEffect: Choose one: Look through your Arsenal and put 1 card in your hand, shuffle it and end your turn; or go through opponent's Arsenal and put any 3 cards into his Ringside pile, then shuffle his Arsenal.

Title: Puppies! Puppies!
CardEffect: Shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. Then draw 2 cards.

Title: Pat & Gerry
CardEffect: Opponent skips his next turn.

Title: Open Up a Can of Whoop-A%$
CardEffect: Your next maneuver this turn is +6D, and your opponent's reversal to it is +20F. Draw a card.

Title: Undertaker's Tombstone Piledriver
CardEffect: As an action, this card is -30F and -25D, discard this card and draw 1 card.

Title: Power of Darkness
CardEffect: +5D to all your maneuvers and +20F to all of opponent's reversals for the rest of this turn.

Title: Mr. Socko
CardEffect: Take 1 card from either your Arsenal or Ringside pile and place it into your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal. While Mr. Socko is in your Ring area, all your maneuvers are +1D.

Title: I Am the Game
CardEffect: All your maneuvers are +3D for the rest of this turn. Draw 2 cards, or force opponent to discard 2 cards.

Title: Smackdown Hotel
CardEffect: Draw 1 card. Look at your opponent's hand. Your next maneuver this turn is +6D.

Title: The People's Eyebrow
CardEffect: Take any 2 cards from your Ringside pile and put them into your hand. Then take any 2 cards from your Ringside pile and shuffle them back into your Arsenal.

Title: The People's Elbow
CardEffect: As a maneuver, this card can only be played if the card titled Rock Bottom is in your Ring area. As an action, place this card back in your Arsenal, shuffle, then draw 2 cards. Doing this will not cause any damage to opponent.

Title: Hellfire & Brimstone
CardEffect: All players discard all cards from their hands. Your opponent places the top 5 cards of his Arsenal into his Ringside pile.

Title: Y2J
CardEffect: Draw up to 5 Cards or force opponent to discard up to 5 cards.

Title: Ayatollah of Rock 'n' Roll-a
CardEffect: Look at your opponent's hand. For the rest of this turn, your opponent's reversals revealed from his Arsenal while applying damage may not reverse your maneuvers.

Title: Shane O'Mac
CardEffect: While this card is in your Ring area, at the start of your turn, before your draw segment, opponent must take the top card from his Arsenal and place it into his Ringside pile.

Title: Maintain Hold
CardEffect: Play after a successful Submission maneuver not reversed and end your turn. You and your opponent may not play maneuvers or actions until your opponent reverses the maintained Submission. On your turn, during the main segment, the Submission does its damage, along with any other abilities on the card. If a reversal is played by your opponent or is revealed while applying damage, both Maintain Hold and the Submission maneuver remain in your Ring area, but you may no longer use the ability of this Maintain Hold card.
